item.title: Game Crashes (with details)
item.dc:creator: Zerrok
item.description:
The problem is that i am unable to get through the “Inbound” level (1st level) without hpl2 ( or hl2?) crashing… the game is crashing. I havn’t been able to find an error like this on the forum. I need someone to solve this problem :freeman:

I launch the game, hit new game, then i wait in the tram ride until the game crashes on the very 1st tram turn of every time i try to play.
(i am also noticing that most of the scientist models have blood stains all over them)

Note: Whenever i have my character looking straight at the ground i have no problems making it through the 1st turn, in fact, i could play this game if i would keep looking down the entire time. Whenever i look up more than 45degrees from straight down @ the ground the game crashes (past that 1st turn area). [i think this might be some kind of evil texture]

  • i have downloaded the Source sdk base 2007 in steam
  • i have my BMS file in the correct path
  • im pretty sure my hardware meets requirements (and passes)
  • i have tried playing this game in windowed mode @ lower resolution.

Hardware:
CPU : AMD Fx-4100 3.6Ghz not over clocked (supports 5.0 shader)
GPU: ATI/AMD Radeon 6800 series 1024mb
RAM: 16gb DDr3

MDMP error code of latest crash: hl2_3943_crash_2013_8_10T6_4_58C0.mdmp (96.2 KB)

P.S.
I am also suffering another crash whenever i try to adjust my video quality settings to be lowered, might be related. (they currently defaulted to high and what not).
